verses.name: Psalms 68:20
verses.text: He that is our God is the God of salvation; and unto God the Lord belong the issues from death.

verses.name: Psalms 68:21
verses.text: But God shall wound the head of his enemies, and the hairy scalp of such an one as goeth on still in his trespasses.

verses.name: Psalms 68:22
verses.text: The Lord said, I will bring again from Bashan, I will bring my people again from the depths of the sea:

verses.name: Psalms 68:23
verses.text: That thy foot may be dipped in the blood of thine enemies, and the tongue of thy dogs in the same.
